attributes.action: Made legal for all gyms to be in a area where there’s no nuisance to residents
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to act on this as it isn’t something anyone should have to live with. Anyone who has a similar knows how much stress and anxiety this causes needs to be addressed asap
attributes.background: I want to the government to close down every gym in a residential area or view and only allow gyms in areas where no nuisance can be caused to there surrounding as crossfit gyms play loud music, screaming and shouting and weights are thrown around with great force causing disturbance

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local planning matters, including approving the opening of gyms, are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
